class.name: OScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the Orchestration visual script language.
class.description: An [OScript] represents an orchestration, a graph-based, visual script language that works similarly to [GDScript]. Orchestrations are saved with the [code].torch[/code] extension. An orchestration extends the functionality of all objects that instantiate it.

method.name: new
method.description: Returns a new instance of the script. In GDScript, this could be done using: [codeblock] var MyClass = load("myclass.torch") var instance = MyClass.new() print(instance.get_script() == MyClass) # Prints true [/codeblock] In OScript, this would be done using the [OScriptNodeNew] new object node.
